data.name: Game Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the complete soundtrack for The Adventure in the Tower of Flight. It contains all 27 tracks as MP3s, looped once, for a total of 45 min of music.

01. Story - Beginning
02. Story - Middle
03. Title Theme
04. Island Shore
05. Tower Entryway
06. Underground River
07. A Siren's Call
08. Overgrown Forest
09. Outer Wall Climb
10. Cathedral
11. Hot/Cold Cave - Fire
12. Hot/Cold Cave - Ice
13. Dark Catacombs
14. Town
15. Town - Rain
16. The Endless Climb
17. Tick Tock Clock
18. Lights Out
19. A Light Awaits
20. Ending
21. Boss
22. Final Boss
23. Bonus Room
24. Relic Room
25. Hovering Purple Key
26. Shop Theme
27. The Robot Room
